$FB N.Korea uses two short-range ballistic missiles in latest test: S.Korea military 
reuters.com · 2022/01/13 21:31 GMT-05:00 
 
SEOUL, Jan 14 (Reuters) - North Korea used two short-range ballistic missiles in the latest weapons test on Friday, South Korea's Joint Chief of Staff said, adding they were fired from the northeastern province of North Pyongan. 
 
 
(Reporting by Hyonhee Shin; Editing by Himani Sarkar) 
 
((hyonhee.shin@thomsonreuters.com; 822 3704 5658;))

https://appleinsider.com/articles/22/01/13/apple-will-shatter-its-holiday-quarter-earnings-record-despite-supply-issues-analyst-says

links.title: Apple will shatter its holiday quarter earnings record despite supply issues, analyst says | AppleInsider
links.description: Investment bank JP Morgan expects Apple to beat Wall Street's consensus when it reports revenue, and break its holiday quarter records, despite a hit from supply chain constraints. In a note to investors seen by AppleInsider, JP Morgan lead analyst Samik Chatterjee outlined his predictions for Apple's Q1 2022, which corresponds to the fourth calendar quarter of 2021.
